summary: Community Health Sentinel - A production-grade AI-powered early warning system for water-borne diseases in Coimbatore District. Features full-screen role selection with strict role-based data control and workflow separation: Common Citizen (view-only Public Transparency Dashboard showing Last Government Inspection Report with ward data, water quality metrics, disease risk distribution, safety guidelines, village heatmap, and read-only alert history), Hospital/PHC (ward-specific data entry with case reporting and 7-14 day forecast), and Government Health Authority (full control panel with 12-15 field Government Data Update Panel for environmental and infrastructure data, Update & Recalculate Risk functionality, comprehensive analytics including disease classification system with Cholera/Typhoid/Dysentery/Hepatitis A probabilities, 3x3 grid-style village risk heatmap for 9 wards, ward priority scoring with vulnerability weighting formula, full audit log alert history with all environmental metrics and email status, EmailJS integration with automatic triggering at >70% risk and manual send capability, 14-day predictive forecast, disease distribution visualizations, patient case trend graphs, resource deployment recommendations, comparative ward analytics, CSV export capability, and advanced visualizations). Built with modular architecture for government deployment readiness.
